column3: Upset about working at a different table. He was saying mean things. Disruptive to class. asked to leave. In the hall got aggressive with staff. Taken to time out and then PAS room.

Was using a toy from reading class inappropriately. He was very distracted by the toy. Was given opportunities to stop playing with it. Not following directions. Started to destroy things in the class. Was asked to leave class
column4: pushed threw staff. Taken to time out to calm.

column5: roll/throw things at classmates. He bit
